## Profile

Economist with expertise in causal inference, public finance, and policy evaluation. Experience leading analytical teams in government and academia, with a focus on incorporating rigorous statistical tools into program design and evaluation. Interested in labor markets, social protection, and the use of data for public impact.

## Research Interests

Labor economics, social protection, applied econometrics, causal inference, public finance, data science for policy
